Richard Bauer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Bauer 0 Richard Bauer (March 14, 1939 - March 1, 1999) was an American actor. He won an Obie Award in 1978 for his performances in Landscape of the Body and The Dybbuk. Richard_Bauer ( March_14_,_1939 - March_1_,_1999 ) was an_American_actor . He won an_Obie_Award in 1978 for his_performances in Landscape of the_Body and The_Dybbuk .
